title: Death toll in great earthquakes as of 2016
summary: The statistic presents the death toll in individual countries due to the world 's major volcanic eruptions from 1900 to 2016 . The volcanic eruption in cameroon on 24 , 1986 claimed a total of 1746 deaths . volcanic eruptions A volcanic eruption is defined as a discharge of lava and gas from a volcanic vent or fissure .
gold: The statistic shows the earthquakes with the highest death toll worldwide from 1900 to 2016 . Total 242,000 people were killed in the earthquake in Tangshan / China in 1976 .
